Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Tom Selleck publicly endorsed President Donald Trump, when in fact there is no evidence or interview to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no credible source or evidence provided to back up the assertion that Tom Selleck endorsed President Donald Trump.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Tom Selleck's endorsement of President Donald Trump is a fact, without providing any substantial evidence or reliable sources.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Tom Selleck never conducted an interview with Breitbart News or made any public statements endorsing President Donald Trump.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the words attributed to Tom Selleck in the claim were actually spoken by another actor, Jon Voight, who did endorse Trump in 2016.
